name: Respironics SleepEasy CPAP Machine and HumidifierMonica
description:
Features

  • Deluxe ramp capabilities allow a 0- to 45-minute period with a patient-adjustable ramp start pressure.
  • Lighted patient buttons control the CPAP unit.
  • Pressure calibration screen allows you to set target pressure to within 0.1 cm H20.
  • Three-position altitude compensation.
  • Quiet operation at 33 dB.
  • EncorePRO compliance reporting capabilities, including phone-in compliance and easy-to-use report generation.
People find comfort in simple pleasures. That’s why Respironics made the SleepEasy CPAP machine as simple as possible. Respironics’ quality and convenience is now available in a budget-friendly CPAP model. This machine includes a true integrated heated humidifier.

THE NEW SLEEPEASY SLEEP THERAPY SYSTEM:
It’s a simple, reliable CPAP that you can trust—and use. Performance and portability are within reach thanks to the combination of features and appealing design that you’ll find only in SleepEasy CPAP machine.
QUALITY YOU CAN COUNT ON:
SleepEasy is built in the U.S. and combines proven technologies and designs that have been Respironics standards for more than 30 years.
EASY TO USE:
A permanently attached humidifier and easy-to-use control buttons make this sleep therapy system easy to set up and easier to live with.
BUILT-IN HUMIDIFIER:
This machine lets you heat and humidify the air as it moves in your airway. With this integrated humidifier, YOU can choose what type of humidification you receive by changing the level of the humidifier, or by cutting it off completely.
A CPAP THAT DOESN’T LOOK LIKE A CPAP:
To help make therapy as natural as it can be, we’ve designed the SleepEasy system to look more like a natural part of a bedroom and less like a medical device. We made it sleeker, smaller and less obtrusive—and its new textured casing will more easily blend into home décor.

name: PR System One REMstar CPAP Machine and Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Made in the USA
  • Auto dimming LED lights helps create a darker room for easy sleeping
  • Compliance meter breathing detection
  • Includes the Respironics Performance Tubing
The Philips-Respironics "System One" REMstar takes a smarter approach to the entire sleep management process. New features such as Dry Box technology and System One humidity control put this CPAP machine on the cutting edge.

The PR System One uses a SD card for data collection. Prior to the System One, patients were required to use a specialized card reader when uploading sleep data to a computer. Philips-Respironics has made this process easier by using the standard SD card, giving the patient the ability to use any SD reader to upload sleep data to the EncorePro or EncoreAnywhere software. The REMstar will record Patterns of use data only.

Philips-Respironics also listened to user feedback when designing the System One Heated Humidifier. A cleverly designed water chamber works with a built in Dry Box to virtually eliminate water getting into the machine during normal use. Even with a water chamber filled to the FULL line, the machine can be tilted and even turned upside down without leaking water back into the unit*. Furthermore, System One Humidity Control monitors room temperature, room humidity, and flow to determine what is required to maintain your selected humidity setting, even when environmental conditions change. Because of this, you can be assured that your therapy comfort will be maximized by virtually eliminating rain-out and condensation buildup in the tubing.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: PR System One REMstar Pro AutoIQ CPAP with Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Made in the USA
  • Easy to remove and attach humidifier
  • Auto dimming LED lights helps create a darker room for easy sleeping
  • Compliance meter breathing detection
  • Includes the Respironics Performance Tubing
The Philips-Respironics "System One" REMstar Pro with AutoIQ has all of the features available with the original REMstar Pro but with added benefits to ensure the patient receives the proper care and compliance. The System One’s newest addition of sleep therapy has a system smart enough to track and deliver breath-by-breath therapy for up to 30 days while it learns the patient treatment needs. The two new features are Auto-Trial and Auto-Check.

Auto-Trial and Auto-Check

The Auto-Trial phase gathers information and based on what it learns, it then sets a fixed pressure and converts to the Auto-Check phase. The Auto-Check then checks back every 30 hours just to see if the therapy pressure it established is still on track. If not, the device will automatically adjust to obtain an ideal pressure. All of this without the need to send someone from the care team to the patients homes.

C-Flex+ is Respironics’ newest enhancement to comfort when in fixed CPAP mode. Like C-Flex, C-Flex+ provides flow-based pressure relief at the beginning of exhalation. Like A-Flex, C-Flex+ softens the pressure transition from inhalation to exhalation to provide additional comfort in fixed-CPAP mode.

The System One resistance control allows the patient to tell the machine what type of mask you are using such as a nasal, full face, or nasal pillow. The machine then makes adjustments for optimal flow depending on your mask. Each Respironics mask will now come with a resistance control setting letting you know how to set your machine to match your mask.

Philips-Respironics has upgraded their event detection algorithm to include data on Snoring, Periodic Breathing (PB), Respiratory Effort-Related Arousals (RERAs), Apnea Hyponea Index (AHI), leak, Clear Airway Apnea (CA), Obstructed Airway Apnea (OA), and Hyponea (HY). The REMstar Pro will also record Patterns of use and Flow waveform data. With this information, your physician will be able to better determine the best possible solutions for your sleep therapy.

The PR System One uses a SD card for data collection. Prior to the System One, patients were required to use a specialized card reader when uploading sleep data to a computer. Philips-Respironics has made this process easier by using the standard SD card, giving the patient the ability to use any SD reader to upload sleep data.

Philips-Respironics also listened to user feedback when designing the System One Heated Humidifier. A cleverly designed water chamber works with a built in Dry Box to virtually eliminate water getting into the machine during normal use. Even with a water chamber filled to the FULL line, the machine can be tilted and even turned upside down without leaking water back into the unit*. Furthermore, System One Humidity Control monitors room temperature, room humidity, and flow to determine what is required to maintain your selected humidity setting, even when environmental conditions change. Because of this, you can be assured that your therapy comfort will be maximized by virtually eliminating rain-out and condensation buildup in the tubing.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: PR System One REMstar CPAP and Humidifier with Heated Tubing
description:
Features

  • Now available with Bluetooth Technology
  • Made in the USA
  • Enhanced patient compliance
  • Optional monitoring mode
  • Auto-Trial mode
  • Includes the Respironics Heated Tubing
The ingenious and polished new design of the Philips Respironics System One 60 Series Auto IQ CPAP takes patient compliance to new levels. With the CPAP Check mode the user can relax knowing the proper pressure is being administered. The Check mode will check the therapy pressure every 30 hours to ensure the patient demands or needs are being met. The pressure will automatically adjust to an optimal pressure to improve therapy. Neither the patient nor the physician has to wonder if the proper pressure is being administered with the Check mode available with the Respironics CPAP machine.

Bluetooth



With Bluetooth technology from Respironics your therapy will become a little easier to manage and definitely easier to follow. Respironics introduces REMstar System One units with Bluetooth capability to the industry as a key component to patient health and wellness during PAP therapy. Patients are able to pair their mobile devices with their PAP unit for quick access to therapy results using SleepMapper. For more information on how to use your new Bluetooth Technology by Respironics click here.

Auto-Trial

In the Auto-Trial stage, the system gathers patient sleep pattern information. The data that has been collected is then used to determine a permanent pressure. With this clever mode, Respironics has opened doors to the patient desiring home testing as well as physician requiring more information after a lab based sleep study. The patient is given the which will deliver automatic pressure based on the patient’s needs up to 30 days. After the 30 day Auto-Trial period the patient’s fixed pressure is automatically determined and set. The Auto IQ is great for patients who have experienced lifestyle changes such as weight loss or gain and so on.

Heated Tube

Condensation is a problem of the past, Respironics has introduced heated tubing to the 60 Series CPAP units. Respironics had virtually eliminated the rain-put issues with the temperature control mechanism standard with all their units but has now taken the condensation battle a step further. * PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

Prescription Statement:

“A valid prescription is required for the purchase of this product.”

name: Respironics DreamStation Auto CPAP DOM with A-Flex
description:
• Lightweight and Compact
  • Sleek revolutionary design
  • Less than 30 db noise level
  • Easy view LCD screen
  • Wifi and cellular ready technology
  • Stylish and easy to clean
Overview

Philips Respironics has done it again with the NEW DreamStation Auto CPAP DOM with A-Flex which is part of their Dream therapy line of products. CPAP therapy experience designed to provide customized tools to ensure the best possible solutions for YOU with the New Respironics DreamStation Sleep Therapy System. DreamStation offers exceptional comfort, intelligent monitoring, motivation and feedback, and seamless connectivity to the care team for proven clinical care and effortless patient management. The Respironics DreamStation Auto CPAP has all the right tools such as Daily Progress Feedback, EZStart, Easy Viewing LCD Screen, Bluetooth, SmartRamp, EncoreAnywhere, DreamMapper, and more.

The patient-driven designed Respironics DreamStation CPAP Sleep Therapy System was constructed from beginning to end from patient feedback and technological advances. Every possible tool has been incorporated into the design to offer comfortable, progressive, and accurate therapy. With EZStart new as well as experienced PAP therapy patients may adapt to the prescribed therapy levels via the innovative pressure acclimation algorithm with automatic, personalized adjustments to the CPAP pressure over the first 30 days.

With the Daily Progress Feedback summary, patients will be able to review the therapy status. The full color LCD screen displays hours of use trends along with summary of the last 30 days of nights with more than 4 hours of good therapy.

Bluetooth technology has become one of the most sought after and necessary features on most devices used daily and Respironics recognizes the need. Bluetooth is a standard feature on ALL DreamStation devices! Connect to DreamMapper with ease for management of therapy to give the patient an active role in their therapy.

Let’s not forget the Respironics powerful humidification system which controls PAP therapy humidity. When the Respironics Humidifier is used the environmental conditions are evaluated by the smart humidification system and adjustments are made to control the level of humidification. By controlling the humidification levels during therapy the condensation buildup in the tubing in decreased.



Reduce manual adjustments

  • CPAP-Check

    Checks on the user every 30 hours to determine if CPAP pressure is optimal. If not, it automatically adjusts to meet changing patient needs.
  • Auto-Trial

    Delivers breath-by-breath auto-CPAP therapy for up to a total 30 days per patient. Transitions to CPAP or CPAP-Check mode at end of Auto-Trial.
  • Opti-Start

    Provides optimal starting pressure that can enhance patient comfort and reduce the likelihood of residual events at the beginning of therapy.




DreamMapper

name: PR System One REMstar Pro Auto IQ CPAP
description:
Features

  • Made in the USA
  • Easy to remove and attach humidifier
  • Auto dimming LED lights helps create a darker room for easy sleeping
  • Compliance meter breathing detection
  • Includes the Respironics Performance Tubing
The Philips-Respironics "System One" REMstar Pro with AutoIQ has all of the features available with the original REMstar Pro but with added benefits to ensure the patient receives the proper care and compliance. The System One’s newest addition of sleep therapy has a system smart enough to track and deliver breath-by-breath therapy for up to 30 days while it learns the patient treatment needs. The two new features are Auto-Trial and Auto-Check.

Auto-Trial and Auto-Check

The Auto-Trial phase gathers information and based on what it learns, it then sets a fixed pressure and converts to the Auto-Check phase. The Auto-Check then checks back every 30 hours just to see if the therapy pressure it established is still on track. If not, the device will automatically adjust to obtain an ideal pressure. All of this without the need to send someone from the care team to the patients homes.

C-Flex+ is Respironics’ newest enhancement to comfort when in fixed CPAP mode. Like C-Flex, C-Flex+ provides flow-based pressure relief at the beginning of exhalation. Like A-Flex, C-Flex+ softens the pressure transition from inhalation to exhalation to provide additional comfort in fixed-CPAP mode.

The System One resistance control allows the patient to tell the machine what type of mask you are using such as a nasal, full face, or nasal pillow. The machine then makes adjustments for optimal flow depending on your mask. Each Respironics mask will now come with a resistance control setting letting you know how to set your machine to match your mask.

Philips-Respironics has upgraded their event detection algorithm to include data on Snoring, Periodic Breathing (PB), Respiratory Effort-Related Arousals (RERAs), Apnea Hyponea Index (AHI), leak, Clear Airway Apnea (CA), Obstructed Airway Apnea (OA), and Hyponea (HY). The REMstar Pro will also record Patterns of use and Flow waveform data. With this information, your physician will be able to better determine the best possible solutions for your sleep therapy.

The PR System One uses a SD card for data collection. Prior to the System One, patients were required to use a specialized card reader when uploading sleep data to a computer. Philips-Respironics has made this process easier by using the standard SD card, giving the patient the ability to use any SD reader to upload sleep data.

Philips-Respironics also listened to user feedback when designing the System One Heated Humidifier. A cleverly designed water chamber works with a built in Dry Box to virtually eliminate water getting into the machine during normal use. Even with a water chamber filled to the FULL line, the machine can be tilted and even turned upside down without leaking water back into the unit*. Furthermore, System One Humidity Control monitors room temperature, room humidity, and flow to determine what is required to maintain your selected humidity setting, even when environmental conditions change. Because of this, you can be assured that your therapy comfort will be maximized by virtually eliminating rain-out and condensation buildup in the tubing.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: PR System One REMstar Plus CPAP Machine and Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Made in the USA
  • Easy to remove and attach humidifier
  • Auto dimming LED lights helps create a darker room for easy sleeping
  • Compliance meter breathing detection
  • Includes the Respironics Performance Tubing
The Philips-Respironics "System One" REMstar Plus with C-Flex takes a smarter approach to the entire sleep management process. New features such as Dry Box technology, System One humidity control, and C-Flex put this CPAP machine on the cutting edge.

Respironics' patented C-Flex technology offers a more comfortable way to deliver sleep therapy by taking the work out of exhalation. C-Flex tracks and reacts to every breath throughout the night, increasing your comfort as you exhale.

The PR System One uses a SD card for data collection. Prior to the System One, patients were required to use a specialized card reader when uploading sleep data to a computer. Philips-Respironics has made this process easier by using the standard SD card, giving the patient the ability to use any SD reader to upload sleep data to the EncorePro or EncoreAnywhere software. The REMstar Plus will record Patterns of use data only.

Philips-Respironics also listened to user feedback when designing the System One Heated Humidifier. A cleverly designed water chamber works with a built in Dry Box to virtually eliminate water getting into the machine during normal use. Even with a water chamber filled to the FULL line, the machine can be tilted and even turned upside down without leaking water back into the unit*. Furthermore, System One Humidity Control monitors room temperature, room humidity, and flow to determine what is required to maintain your selected humidity setting, even when environmental conditions change. Because of this, you can be assured that your therapy comfort will be maximized by virtually eliminating rain-out and condensation buildup in the tubing.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: PR System One REMstar Pro C-Flex+ CPAP with Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Now available with Bluetooth Technology
  • Made in the USA
  • Auto-Check
  • Easy to remove and attach humidifier
  • Auto dimming LED lights helps create a darker room for easy sleeping
  • Compliance meter breathing detection
  • Includes the Respironics Performance Tubing
New and improved look with all the best features patients have come to expect from Respironics. Above the new look, Respironics has enhanced many features such as the tubing. Now, patients who have experienced condensation build-up due to higher pressures and environment have a choice of heated tubing. The user will find operating the new Respironics DS460HS a breeze with easy to grasp knob and redesigned water chamber that is easily removed for filling and cleaning.

Bluetooth



With Bluetooth technology from Respironics your therapy will become a little easier to manage and definitely easier to follow. Respironics introduces REMstar System One units with Bluetooth capability to the industry as a key component to patient health and wellness during PAP therapy. Patients are able to pair their mobile devices with their PAP unit for quick access to therapy results using SleepMapper. For more information on how to use your new Bluetooth Technology by Respironics click here.



Auto-Trial and Auto-Check

The Auto-Trial stage collects data and based on what is discovered, a fixed pressure is then set and changes to the Auto-Check stage. After 30 hours of use the Auto-Check tests the previously established pressure to ensure the therapy is correct. If Auto-Check finds the pressure is not working for the patient’s required therapy, it will alter the pressure to the patient’s needs. The Auto-Check feature will ensure the patient is always at the most advantageous pressure.





* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.
